channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taipei City Planners To Tear Down Structurally Unsound ‘Sea-Sand Buildings’
item.description: Taipei officials are planning to demolish and renovate more of the city's “sea-sand buildings.” The move comes after the recent Hualien earthquake damaged structurally unsound buil

item.title: Film Studio Backlot, Former Amusement Park Damaged in South Taiwan Fire
item.description: A film studio backlot and former amusement park in Tainan has been heavily damaged by fire. Fire fighters managed to contain the blaze at Baihe Taiwan Film and TV Town and reporte

item.title: Mickey Huang Scandal Exposes Global Challenge of Online Child Sexual Abuse
item.description: The recent local scandal involving TV host Mickey Huang has exposed the global nature of child sexual abuse online.

item.title: Mother Alleges Nanny Hospitalized Child in Another Child Abuse Case in Taiwan
item.description: A mother has alleged that her nanny abused and seriously injured her five-month-old baby in what has become a string of child abuse scandals in Taiwan in recent months.
